Package levelbuilder.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuilderBoardController
    Controller for Board in the builder; Modify BuilderBoardView; When a desired tile is pressed, an action is attempted to progress game and update board
    BuilderReleaseBoardController
    Controller for Release Board in the builder; Modify BuilderBoardView; When a desired tile is pressed, an action is attempted to progress game and update board
    CreateNewLevelBuilderController
    Controller for Creating a New Level; Go To Level Mode Screen (Panel) When the button is pressed to attempt to go to the next screen, the model will update what screen it is on and the gui will reflect the changes
    DeleteLevelController
    Controller for deleting a level; delete level then goes To BuilderMainMenu Screen (Panel) When the button is pressed to attempt to save the level and go to the next screen, the model will update what screen it is on and the gui will reflect the changes
    DeselectReleaseButtonsController
    Controller for deselecting the release color and number buttons.
    EditNewLevelBuilderController
    Controller for going to the specific type of level for building.
    GoToMainMenuBuilderController
    Controller for Moving Screens; Go To BuilderMainMenu Screen (Panel) When the button is pressed to attempt to go to the next screen, the model will update what screen it is on and the gui will reflect the changes
    IncrementPieceBuilderController
    Controller for the bullpen in the builder.
    LoadLevelsBuilderController
    Controller for loading the level select panel.
    RandomizeReleaseController
    Controller for Board gameplay; Modify BoardView; When the randomize button is pressed, we randomize the release tiles throughout the level.
    RedoController
    Controller for redoing a level.
    SaveLevelController
    Controller for saving a level; saves level then goes To BuilderMainMenu Screen (Panel) When the button is pressed to attempt to save the level and go to the next screen, the model will update what screen it is on and the gui will reflect the changes
    SelectLevelBuilderController
    Controller for Moving Screens; Go To Play Level Screen (Panel).
    SetColorController
    Controller for Board gameplay; Modify BoardView; This controller sets the color of the numbers in the release level.
    SetNumberController
    Controller for Board gameplay; Modify BoardView; This controller sets the number buttons in the release level.
    TestLevelBuilderController
    Controller for Moving Screens; Go To BuilderMainMenu Screen (Panel).
    UndoController
    Controller for undoing the moves in the level.
